All Classes and Interfaces

Class
Description
AccessModifiers
The access modifiers that can be used.
ArrayOperand
The class that represent each operand of type array.
ArrayType
 
AssignInstruction
Class representing assignments.
BinaryOpInstruction
Class representing all the instructions with 2 operands.
CallInstruction
Class representing the CALL instructions.
CallType
The kind of function call for CALL instructions.
ClassType
The Type is a Class.
ClassUnit
Class representing all the information loaded from the OLLIR input.
CondBranchInstruction
Class representing the OLLIR conditional instructions.
Descriptor
Class used to store the information regarding each variable of a method.
Element
Class representing the elements used in the OLLIR instructions.
ElementType
The type of each element used in an OLLIR instruction.
Field
Class representing the fields of an OLLIR class.
FieldInstruction
Class representing the field instructions: getfield, getstatic, putfield, putstatic.
GetFieldInstruction
Class representing the field instructions: getfield, getstatic.
GotoInstruction
Class representing the goto instructions.
Instruction
Class representing an OLLIR instruction.
InstructionType
The type of instruction.
LiteralElement
Class represents the OLLIR elements that are literals.
Method
Class represents each method in the input OLLIR class.
Node
Class the represents a node in the CFG.
NodeType
Type of the node in the control-flow-graph (CFG) of each method/function
NonAccessModifiers
The types of non-access modifiers.
Ollir
Class with a main example with the current stages of the OLLIR tool.
OllirErrorException
Class representing the exceptions thrown when an error is identified when loading the OLLIR input.
OllirParser
Grammar to parse OLLIR 1.0
OllirParserConstants
Token literal values and constants.
OllirParserTokenManager
Token Manager.
OpCondInstruction
Conditional branch that has a OpInstruction as condition.
Operand
Class representing the elements of OLLIR instructions that are not literals.
OperandType
The type of each operand in an OLLIR instruction.
Operation
Class representing the operation in an OLLIR instruction.
OperationType
The type of operation.
OpInstruction
Class representing the OLLIR instructions that are operations.
ParseException
This exception is thrown when parse errors are encountered.
PutFieldInstruction
Class representing the field instructions: putfield, putstatic.
ReturnInstruction
Class representing the OLLIR return instructions.
SimpleCharStream
An implementation of interface CharStream, where the stream is assumed to contain only ASCII characters (without unicode processing).
SingleOpCondInstruction
Conditional branch that has a SingleOpInstruction as condition.
SingleOpInstruction
Class representing the instructions with a single element.
Token
Describes the input token stream.
TokenMgrError
Token Manager Error.
Type
Class representing the type of variables, assignments, returns, literals.
UnaryOpInstruction
Class representing the OLLIR instructions with unary operations.
VarScope
The scope of the variables considering three scopes in OLLIR: field (class variable), method local variables, method parameters
